alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 23 at 8:03AM MST until February 23 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST /1 PM CST/ TODAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Kansas, east central and northeast Colorado and southwest Nebraska. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from 2 AM MST /3 AM CST/ to 8 AM MST /9 AM CST/ Wednesday. The Wind Chill Advisory remains in effect until noon MST/ 1pm CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County
